titles.title: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013
To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to reform payment to States under the Medicaid program.
Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

term.name: Department of Health and Human Services

bill.summary: Medicaid Accountability and Care Act of 2013 - Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act (SSA) to revise payments to states under the Medicaid program, including granting an option to receive Medicare payments for full-benefit dual eligible individuals (who are eligible for Medicare benefits under SSA title XVIII as well as Medicaid).
